channel.title: Need help with my rsps
channel.description:
hee there,
i got a rsps server i did everything right this is my server https://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=82.173.157.41 but there is 1 problem . when people run the client it says error connection when they try to login how i can fix it * so people cant login * need help.

item.title: Need help with my rsps
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

[quote=“leader317, post:1, topic:552769”]hee there,

i got a rsps server i did everything right this is my server https://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=82.173.157.41
but there is 1 problem .
when people run the client it says error connection when they try to login how i can fix it * so people cant login * need help.[/quote]

Here’s what you need to do, make the ip in client.java or gui.java your ip save and compile it, after thats done send them the client. Once you send them the client with your ip you can change back your ip to normal host ip 127.0.0.1

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with my rsps
item.dc:creator: @Maester_Dreamshot Maester_Dreamshot
item.description:
@Maester_Dreamshot wrote:

Depending on Revision your ip could be in a different place.

If it’s a 317 try going to your client files then search for "client.java"
Press Ctrl+f
Search for: Server =

Replace whatever is in the quote marks "127.0.0.1 or localhost"
To your vps ip.

If you need more help message me via here or add me on skype, i’m happy to help.

Skype: Dreamshot.Rs

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with my rsps
item.dc:creator: @beale beale
item.description:
@beale wrote:

[quote=“leader317, post:1, topic:552769”]hee there,

i got a rsps server i did everything right this is my server https://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=82.173.157.41
but there is 1 problem .
when people run the client it says error connection when they try to login how i can fix it * so people cant login * need help.[/quote]

probably should be in server/client help, but oh well… Anyways, have you tried fixing the IP to match your VPS or your IP to portforward? If you have it set as localhost or “127.0.0.1”, the client won’t allow other players to sign into the server. Check client.java client sided for the Server IP.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with my rsps
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Probably the wrong section there homie.

Read full topic
